description:
Crushing kms in the cold just got easier. With Gore-tex Infinium Windstopper outer to keep wind at bay and a Polartec fleece lining to warm you up, the Estremo shoecovers will keep your feet happy in the cold. Rear water resistant YKK zippers make it easy to get in and out of and keep precipitation from biting at your heels.

  • GORE-TEX INFINIUM™ WINDSTOPPER® fabric with fleece lining helps you hold onto your heat and give you protection from the elements
  • Polartec® Power Stretch® Pro™ lining adds even more warmth so you can brave the cold
  • YKK® Aquaguard zipper is durable and keeps moisture out
  • Extra durable material underfoot means you can walk in confidence
  • High coverage adds more protection when the weather turns on you
  • Added material on the front fends off crank rub making them last longer
  • Reflective details provide visibility to help you been seen
name: Castelli Estremo Shoecover - Unisex
